title: SCAPS-1D simulated organometallic halide perovskites: A comparison of performance under Sub-Saharan temperature condition
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Anthony C. Ozurumba, Nnamdi V. Ogueke, Chinyere A. Madu, Eli Danladi, Chisom P. Mbachu, Abubakar S. Yusuf, Philibus M. Gyuk, Ismail Hossain
